CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name == 'Asset Verification',IF(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType, 'PowerPartner'), HYPERLINK($Label.IBL_Community_Partners_URL+"/s/av-page?c__recordId="+Id, "Navigate to AV", "_blank"), HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/c__LOSAV?c__recordId="+Id, "Navigate to AV", "_blank")),'')
CustomField.label: Asset Verification
